name: phonebook-backend
description: exercises to learn using Express, Morgan, MongoDB and app deployment to the Internet

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd D:/GitHub_Projects/fullstack-open-core/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist d/GitHub_Projects/FullStackOpen-core-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin main

author: Prakirth Govardhanam
